Current State of the Art

  • Some Web browsers and servers written completely in Smalltalk.
    • No SSL, SHTTP support

    • Non standard configuration / administration

    • Would rather utilize existing browsers and servers and extend with Smalltalk.

  • No CGI interface for Smalltalk
    • Technically not needed, since Smalltalk programs can be packaged as executables, but see the next page ...
